ref: In a hurry, she drove to school in housecoat and slippers.

src: Practicaba para su recital.
mt: He was practicing for his recital.
ref: She was practicing for her recital.

src: No le gusta el desplazamiento.
mt: He doesn't like traveling.
ref: He doesn't like his commute.

src: Esa noche era el gran partido.
mt: That night was the big game.
ref: Tonight was the big game.

src: Se quejó de que tenía problemas para dormir.
mt: He complained that he had trouble sleeping.
ref: She complained that she had trouble sleeping.

src: Después del trabajo, fue al gimnasio.
mt: After work, he went to the gym.
ref: After work, he drove to the gym.

src: Así que salío a la calle y dio una vuelta por la manzana.
mt: So I went out to the street and took a walk around the block.
ref: So she went outside and walked around her block.

src: Decidió repartir periódicos para ganar dinero.
mt: He decided to deliver newspapers to earn money.
ref: She decided to deliver papers to earn money.

src: Hablaron durante 5 minutos.
mt: They spoke for 5 minutes.
ref: They talked for 5 minutes.

src: Su madre le llamó para arreglar su ordenador.
mt: His mother called him to fix his computer.
ref: His mother called him over to fix her computer.

src: Justo hoy los he visto estafar a un solicitante que me caía bien.
mt: Just today I saw them scam a guy who I liked.
ref: Just today I watched them scam a requester I had grown to love.

src: Se la llevó al parque para merendar.
mt: She took him to the park for a picnic.
ref: She took them to the park to eat a snack.

src: Glenn, el marido de Dana, cree que su madre trata de envenenarlo.
mt: Glenn, Dana's husband, thinks his mother is trying to poison him.
ref: Dana's husband Glenn thinks her mother is trying to poison him.

src: Tenía que hacer cerca de doce desfiles diferentes en esta semana de la moda.
mt: She had to do about twelve different parades in this week of fashion.
ref: She had about twelve different shows to do this fashion week.

src: Empacábamos todas nuestras cosas y las cargábamos en la furgoneta.
mt: We were packing all our things and loading them into the van.
ref: We would pack up all our stuff and load them into the truck.

src: Gill había visto todos sus episodios.
mt: Gill had seen all his episodes.
ref: Gill had seen every episode.

src: El sábado pasado estuvo cerca.
mt: It was close last Saturday.
ref: Last Saturday he came close.

src: Los amantes no eran conscientes de su presencia.
mt: The lovers were unaware of their presence.
ref: The lovers were oblivious to his presence.

src: La picadura estaba roja y le picaba, pero al principio no le molestó.
mt: The bite was red and itchy, but at first it didn't bother him.
ref: The bite was red and itchy, but it didn't bother him at first.

src: Siempre sacaba mejores notas que sus amigas.
mt: She always got better grades than her friends.
ref: She always got the best grades out of her friends.

src: Disfrutaba hablando y pasando el tiempo con ella.
mt: He enjoyed talking and spending time with her.
ref: He enjoyed talking to her and spending time with her.

src: Un día, llegó a la tienda un hombre y se la llevó a su casa.
mt: One day, a man came to the store and took it to his house.
ref: One day a man comes in the store and takes it home.

src: Ella y su madre esperaron en la cola durante lo que parecieron ser dos horas.
mt: She and her mother waited in line for what seemed like two hours.
ref: Her and her mother waited in line for what seemed like two hours.
